<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vine of Roses](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1384)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 85</row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Spiked Chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [spiked chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60)_ comes in a rich, green color with rose petals painted on the handle in varying shades of red and pink. The chain seems to banish nearby shadows.

<document level="2" id="action-1068" />

<document level="2" id="action-1069" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Vine of Roses
